desc: we are a Japan-base boutique shop, offering original home furnishing and decoration items made of using authentic used Kimono and Obi. As our original items are all hand-made, that makes each item so special, one of the kind. As such our items are just perfect for gifts for someone special and also for yourself.

layout.text: Japanese tradition meets today's world. One-of-a-kind handcrafted creations of vintage Kimono & Obi origin
